title: Variables
text: Represent the speeds using variables, the speed of local train as $$x$$, the speed of express train as $$x+12$$

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the speed(in variable form) by its respective value.

title: Conversion
text: Now, translate the expressions that were multiplied by their monetary values into a single equation. This will be $$4\left(x+12\right)=5(x)$$

title: Substitution
text: Plug $$x$$ into the original relationship find $$x+12$$.

title: Calculation
text: The answer is $$48$$ mph for local train and $$60$$ mph for express train.
